title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 15, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 15, 2013
teaser: China's economy is still growing, but at its slowest pace since 1991. Will the new health care reform law cause workers to leave their jobs as coverage becomes more affordable? And Warren Buffett gives a lesson on philanthropy.
byline: Gigi Douban, Sarah McCammon, Kate Davidson, D Gorenstein, Chester Wisniewski, Bruce Johnson, David Brancaccio, Queena Kim and Julia Coronado
description: China's economy is still growing, but at its slowest pace since 1991. Will the new health care reform law cause workers to leave their jobs as coverage becomes more affordable? And Warren Buffett gives a lesson on philanthropy.
